channel.title: Need help with NPC paths in easryrsc
channel.description: Ok so basically I'm trying to develop a castle defense type mini game to play but I'm having problems with NPC paths. Iv'e set the x,y coords so that the npcs are forced into a straight line but they still wander back and forth on that path. Is there a way to force them to go from point A to point B without stopping?

item.title: Need help with NPC paths in easryrsc
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

He does not want them to wander back only forward

A <-------> B

A ---------> B

model < Npc.java

public void updatePosition() {
}

Read full topic
